content.content: wantJSON will let you create a custom Rest API in a simple way for development and testing. The Rest API is created by wantJSON we call by the name of Payload.
Assuming you are a front-end developer, You want to try some Rest API calls to manipulate data through the front end. Here wantJSON comes to help you to solve this problem with free custom Rest API.
All the Rest API which are created through the wantJSON are called as Payload. Types of Payload are <Highlight>Static Payload</Highlight> and Dynamic Payload

Create a Payload in wantJSON using the JSON or Array of JSON Objects it will generate the Rest API. With those Rest API you can do the CRUD ( Create, Read, Update and Delete ) Operation on your JSON or Array of JSON Objects.
